name: PDF Guru
description: PDF Guru provides tools for creating, editing, and managing PDF documents online.
longDescription: PDF Guru is an online platform designed to simplify the creation, editing, and management of PDF documents for both personal and professional use. It offers a user-friendly interface that allows users to convert files to PDF, merge multiple PDFs, or edit existing documents without needing advanced software. The platform aims to streamline document workflows by providing accessible tools that cater to students, professionals, and businesses alike. By leveraging cloud-based technology, PDF Guru ensures users can access its services from any device with an internet connection. Its mission is to make PDF handling efficient, secure, and cost-effective, eliminating the need for expensive desktop software.
features: Convert various file formats, such as Word or images, to PDF with high accuracy and speed.
Merge multiple PDF files into a single document for streamlined organization.
Edit PDF content, including text, images, and annotations, directly in the browser.
Compress large PDF files to reduce size without compromising quality for easy sharing.
Split large PDFs into smaller, manageable files for specific use cases.
Add digital signatures to PDFs for secure and legally binding document authentication.
Extract specific pages from a PDF to create new documents or share selected content.
Protect PDFs with password encryption to ensure document security.
Convert PDFs back to editable formats like Word or Excel for further modification.
Access OCR technology to convert scanned PDFs into searchable and editable text.

faqs.question: What types of files can I convert to PDF using PDF Guru?
faqs.answer: PDF Guru supports converting various file types, including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and images, into PDF format.

faqs.question: Is there a free version of PDF Guru available?
faqs.answer: Yes, PDF Guru offers a free plan with basic features, though some advanced tools may require a paid subscription.

faqs.question: Can I use PDF Guru on my mobile device?
faqs.answer: Yes, PDF Guru is cloud-based and accessible on any device with a browser, including smartphones and tablets.

faqs.question: Is it safe to upload sensitive documents to PDF Guru?
faqs.answer: PDF Guru uses encryption to secure uploaded files, and documents are typically deleted from servers after processing.

faqs.question: Does PDF Guru support Optical Character Recognition (OCR)?
faqs.answer: Yes, PDF Guru offers OCR to convert scanned PDFs into editable and searchable text, though this may be a premium feature.

faqs.question: Can I merge multiple PDFs into one file?
faqs.answer: Yes, PDF Guru allows users to combine multiple PDF files into a single document easily.

faqs.question: How do I add a signature to a PDF?
faqs.answer: PDF Guru provides a digital signature tool where you can upload or draw a signature to apply to your PDF.
